title: Tom Jiao - tom21487.github.io
about_en: Welcome to my personal website. I am an undergraduate student at the University of Michigan College of Engineering. I am majoring in computer science and minoring in electrical engineering.
about_cn: 欢迎来到我的个人网站。我是密歇根大学工程学院的一名本科生。我主修计算机科学，辅修电子工程。
interests_content_en: Computer Architecture, Digital Verification, Embedded Systems, Linux, Text Editors
interests_content_cn: 计算机体系结构、芯片验证、Linux操作系统、文本编辑器
projects_en: Below is a list of some of my personal projects. I hope to post more.
projects_cn: 以下是我的一些个人项目，希望以后能够分享更多。
